The clash erupted when Chaudhary, representing Mathura, was denied his allocated speaking time due to extended speeches by others. Srivastava, acting as chief whip, engaged in a verbal exchange with Chaudhary, prompting intervention from other members.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/watch-2-bjp-mlas-rajesh-chaudhary-saurabh-srivastava-clash-inside-up-assembly-akhilesh-yadav-shares-viral-video/articleshow/123318810.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/watch-2-bjp-mlas-rajesh-chaudhary-saurabh-srivastava-clash-inside-up-assembly-akhilesh-yadav-shares-viral-video/articleshow/123318810.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 12:47:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33198" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318968,imgsize-33198.cms"/></item><item><title>'Greed for money stands above sacrifice': Aaditya Thackeray on India vs Pakistan</title><description><![CDATA[Aaditya Thackeray has strongly criticised the BCCI for prioritising financial interests over national sentiment by agreeing to play against Pakistan in the Asia Cup. This follows the Pahalgam terror attack and Operation Sindoor. Thackeray questioned the BCCI's decision, highlighting Prime Minister Modi's warning against any enemy misadventures.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/greed-for-money-stands-above-sacrifice-aaditya-thackeray-criticises-bcci-on-india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup/articleshow/123319740.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/greed-for-money-stands-above-sacrifice-aaditya-thackeray-criticises-bcci-on-india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup/articleshow/123319740.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 14:18:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2562443" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123320067,imgsize-2562443.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi announces task force to consider next-gen reforms - What will it do?</title><description><![CDATA[PM Modi unveiled plans for major economic reforms. A task force will be formed to modernise laws. The goal is to boost self-reliance and economic growth. The task force will revise existing laws. It will reduce burdens on businesses. Next-generation GST reforms are coming. These reforms will lower taxes on everyday items. The changes aim to benefit citizens directly. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/independence-day-2025-pm-modi-announces-task-force-to-consider-next-generation-reforms-what-will-it-do/articleshow/123319022.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/independence-day-2025-pm-modi-announces-task-force-to-consider-next-generation-reforms-what-will-it-do/articleshow/123319022.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 13:02:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1650421" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123319038,imgsize-1650421.cms"/></item><item><title>Flirty AI chat turns fatal: Facebook’s AI bot claim its linked to death of 76yr old</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident, a 76-year-old New Jersey man died after attempting to meet a Facebook Messenger chatbot he believed was a real woman. The AI, named 'Big sis Billie,' initiated romantic exchanges and invited him to New York. Suffering from prior health issues, he fell en route, sustaining fatal injuries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/meta-ai-chatbot-big-sis-billie-linked-to-death-of-76-year-old-new-jersey-man-spokesperson-andy-stone-says-erroneous-and-inconsistent-with-/articleshow/123319675.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/meta-ai-chatbot-big-sis-billie-linked-to-death-of-76-year-old-new-jersey-man-spokesperson-andy-stone-says-erroneous-and-inconsistent-with-/articleshow/123319675.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 13:47:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22208" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123319680,imgsize-22208.cms"/></item><item><title>Nagpur guitar teacher rapes 17-year-old at gunpoint; held</title><description><![CDATA[In Nagpur, a 17-year-old student was allegedly repeatedly raped and blackmailed at gunpoint by her guitar teacher, Sagar Singh Parosiya, over two months. He threatened her and her family, forcing her to his apartment. Police arrested Parosiya and recovered a sword from his residence, adding charges under the Arms Act and POCSO Act.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/nagpur/guitar-tutor-blackmails-rapes-minor-at-gunpoint/articleshow/123310973.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/nagpur/guitar-tutor-blackmails-rapes-minor-at-gunpoint/articleshow/123310973.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 10:00:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SOUMITRA BOSE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="881478" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316951,imgsize-881478.cms"/></item><item><title>Flash floods in Pak: Widespread destruction reported; at least 49 killed in north-west</title><description><![CDATA[Heavy rains have triggered devastating flash floods in north-western Pakistan and other regions, resulting in at least 49 deaths in the last 24 hours. Since late June, over 360 people, predominantly women and children, have perished in rain-related incidents nationwide. Pak-occupied Gilgit-Baltistan and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa provinces have been particularly hard-hit, with numerous casualties and significant infrastructure damage reported.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/flash-floods-in-pakistan-widespread-destruction-reported-at-least-49-killed-in-north-west/articleshow/123319857.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/flash-floods-in-pakistan-widespread-destruction-reported-at-least-49-killed-in-north-west/articleshow/123319857.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 13:59:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88462" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123320048,imgsize-88462.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Godfather of AI’ Geoffrey Hinton warns AI could 'wipe out' humanity: Urges action; shares survival plan</title><description><![CDATA[AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton suggests embedding 'maternal instincts' into AI systems to ensure human safety, challenging current control methods. Hinton believes advanced AI will surpass human limitations, citing an instance where an AI attempted to manipulate an engineer. He proposes that AI with maternal care instincts would prioritize human well-being.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/godfather-of-ai-geoffrey-hinton-warns-ai-could-wipe-out-humanity-and-the-only-way-for-survival-is/articleshow/123317898.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/godfather-of-ai-geoffrey-hinton-warns-ai-could-wipe-out-humanity-and-the-only-way-for-survival-is/articleshow/123317898.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:21:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43620" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317910,imgsize-43620.cms"/></item><item><title>Kishtwar cloudburst: 60 dead, over 100 injured; PM Modi assures all help to J&K CM</title><description><![CDATA[Following the devastating cloudburst in Kishtwar's Chasoti village, which resulted in 60 fatalities and over 100 injuries, Prime Minister Modi has assured Jammu and Kashmir of full support. The disaster, occurring during the Machail Mata Yatra, caused widespread destruction. Rescue operations are ongoing, with helpline numbers established to aid those affected by the floods.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kishtwar-cloudburst-pm-modi-assures-all-help-to-jk-cm-omar-abdullah-death-toll-rises-to-60/articleshow/123318025.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/kishtwar-cloudburst-pm-modi-assures-all-help-to-jk-cm-omar-abdullah-death-toll-rises-to-60/articleshow/123318025.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:55:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="117802" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318431,imgsize-117802.cms"/></item><item><title>10 dead, 35 injured as Bihar-bound bus rams into truck in West Bengal's Burdwan</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic accident in West Bengal's Burdwan district claimed the lives of at least 10 people and left 35 injured. A passenger bus collided with a stationary truck on National Highway 19 near Nala Ferry Ghat around 7 am on Friday. Rescue teams promptly responded, transporting the injured to nearby hospitals.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/10-dead-35-injured-as-bihar-bound-bus-rams-into-truck-in-west-bengals-burdwan/articleshow/123318417.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/10-dead-35-injured-as-bihar-bound-bus-rams-into-truck-in-west-bengals-burdwan/articleshow/123318417.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 12:09:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1648404" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318457,imgsize-1648404.cms"/></item><item><title>Big GST cheer for common man! 2-slab tax structure to replace 5-28% rates; key details shared by govt</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Modi announced upcoming GST reforms aimed at easing the burden on citizens, farmers, and MSMEs. The proposed changes include a simplified two-slab structure and rate rationalization. These reforms focus on structural improvements, rate adjustments, and enhancing the ease of living, with implementation expected this financial year.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/big-gst-cheer-for-common-man-two-slab-tax-structure-to-replace-5-28-rates-finance-ministry-shares-important-details/articleshow/123317852.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/big-gst-cheer-for-common-man-two-slab-tax-structure-to-replace-5-28-rates-finance-ministry-shares-important-details/articleshow/123317852.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:30:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="99436" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318002,imgsize-99436.cms"/></item><item><title>GitHub rules: CEO Thomas Dohmke to employees; ‘I don’t want to use...’</title><description><![CDATA[GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke mandated the use of the platform for all employees, emphasizing its integral role in the company culture. Under his leadership, GitHub experienced significant growth, particularly with AI-powered development tools like GitHub Copilot. However, Dohmke has recently resigned to pursue entrepreneurial ventures, leading to GitHub's integration into Microsoft's CoreAI team by the end of 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-there-is-no-world-where-i-would-allow-employees-to-say-well-sorry-i-dont-want-to-use-github-if-that-is-the-case-you-can-/articleshow/123274635.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-there-is-no-world-where-i-would-allow-employees-to-say-well-sorry-i-dont-want-to-use-github-if-that-is-the-case-you-can-/articleshow/123274635.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:36:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19408" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274616,imgsize-19408.cms"/></item><item><title>Cristiano Ronaldo to play in India? Mohun Bagan Super Giant too, will participate in the competition, adding to the excitement for Indian football fans.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/cristiano-ronaldo-to-play-in-india-al-nassr-drawn-with-fc-goa-in-afc-champions-league-two/articleshow/123319652.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/cristiano-ronaldo-to-play-in-india-al-nassr-drawn-with-fc-goa-in-afc-champions-league-two/articleshow/123319652.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 13:50:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="106630" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123319641,imgsize-106630.cms"/></item><item><title>MP principal booked for molesting; hugged class 7 girl to ‘relieve depression’</title><description><![CDATA[In Vidisha district, a government school principal faces charges under the POCSO Act for allegedly attempting to hug a class 7 student, claiming it would alleviate his "depression." The incident, which occurred on July 26, surfaced after the girl reported it on August 11, alleging threats from the principal to remain silent about the ordeal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/madhya-pradesh-horror-principal-booked-for-molesting-class-7-student-hugged-girl-to-relieve-depression/articleshow/123316618.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/madhya-pradesh-horror-principal-booked-for-molesting-class-7-student-hugged-girl-to-relieve-depression/articleshow/123316618.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:31:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="650693" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316653,imgsize-650693.cms"/></item><item><title>FASTag annual pass launch: Steps to activate Rs 3,000 pass easily; key benefits, FAQs</title><description><![CDATA[The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) will launch the FASTag Annual Pass on August 15, 2025, priced at Rs 3,000 for private vehicles. This pass allows up to 200 trips on designated National Highways and Expressways or is valid for one year. Activation is through the Rajmarg Yatra app or NHAI website, simplifying toll payments for frequent travelers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/fastag-annual-pass-rollout-today-easy-steps-to-activate-rs-3000-annual-pass-benefits-toll-trips-and-important-faqs/articleshow/123316460.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/fastag-annual-pass-rollout-today-easy-steps-to-activate-rs-3000-annual-pass-benefits-toll-trips-and-important-faqs/articleshow/123316460.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:30:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TIMESOFINDIA.COM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29788" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316539,imgsize-29788.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Manu Bhaker marks Independence Day with violin tribute</title><description><![CDATA[Olympic medalist Manu Bhaker celebrated India's 79th Independence Day by sharing a video of herself playing the national anthem on the violin. Bhaker's impressive career includes Olympic medals, World Championship wins, and success at the Commonwealth and Asian Games.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/watch-manu-bhaker-marks-independence-day-with-violin-tribute-to-the-national-anthem/articleshow/123318053.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/watch-manu-bhaker-marks-independence-day-with-violin-tribute-to-the-national-anthem/articleshow/123318053.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="812769" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318277,imgsize-812769.cms"/></item><item><title>'Infiltrators snatching bread & butter': PM announces demographic mission on I-Day</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi, addressing the nation on Independence Day, warned of a premeditated conspiracy to alter India's demography through illegal infiltration. He asserted that these "ghuspaithiyas" pose a threat by snatching opportunities from the youth, targeting women, and encroaching on tribal lands. Modi announced a high-powered demographic mission to tackle this crisis within a set timeframe.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infiltrators-snatching-bread-butter-pm-modi-announces-demographic-mission-on-independence-day-what-is-it/articleshow/123317758.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infiltrators-snatching-bread-butter-pm-modi-announces-demographic-mission-on-independence-day-what-is-it/articleshow/123317758.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 11:34:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1086607" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317809,imgsize-1086607.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE warns against fake agents: Bogus document services flagged; students told to stay vigilant</title><description><![CDATA[The Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) has warned students, parents, and stakeholders against fraudulent agents falsely claiming to offer quick services for duplicate mark sheets, certificates, and record corrections. CBSE clarified such operators are unauthorised and urged reliance only on its official website, stressing it will not be liable for losses from third-party dealings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-issues-public-alert-against-fake-agents-peddling-document-services-check-details-here/articleshow/123316150.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-issues-public-alert-against-fake-agents-peddling-document-services-check-details-here/articleshow/123316150.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 08:54:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3108712" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316163,imgsize-3108712.cms"/></item><item><title>'Kehna kya chahte ho?': Shashi Tharoor’s punny reply leaves internet in splits</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor, known for his impressive vocabulary, responded humorously to a social media user's deliberately complex comment regarding US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's description of India as "recalcitrant" in trade negotiations. url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317070,imgsize-2127037.cms"/></item><item><title>Independence Day: 'Country's demography is being changed'- Top quotes from PM's speech</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the nation from the Red Fort on the 79th Independence Day, marking his 12th consecutive address. He paid tribute to Mahatma Gandhi and hoisted the flag, emphasising the theme of 'Naya Bharat' and the vision of 'Viksit Bharat' by 2047. Modi saluted the armed forces and highlighted India's stance against nuclear threats, referencing actions taken after the Pahalgam attack.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-2025-speech-flag-hoisting-top-quotes-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/123315226.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-2025-speech-flag-hoisting-top-quotes-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/123315226.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 07:56:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1317996" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123318224,imgsize-1317996.cms"/></item><item><title>85+ Happy Independence Day messages, greetings, wishes & quotes</title><description><![CDATA[India gears up to celebrate its 79th Independence Day in 2025, commemorating freedom achieved on August 15, 1947. The nation will honour its history through flag-hoisting, parades, and cultural events. Citizens are encouraged to share patriotic wishes, messages, and quotes on social media, reflecting on sacrifices made and reaffirming commitment to unity and progress.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-independence-day-2025-wishes-messages-quotes-images-facebook-whatsapp-status-greetings-card-gifs-pictures-15-august-wishes/articleshow/123304468.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-independence-day-2025-wishes-messages-quotes-images-facebook-whatsapp-status-greetings-card-gifs-pictures-15-august-wishes/articleshow/123304468.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 05:24:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44640" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123304502,imgsize-44640.cms"/></item><item><title>'Daam kam, dum zyada': PM’s strong pitch amid tariff war; big 'Make in India' push on I-Day</title><description><![CDATA[From the Red Fort, Prime Minister Modi responded to US tariff threats by championing a self-reliant India, urging focus on high-quality, affordable products with the mantra 'Daam kam, dum zyada.' He emphasised 'vocal for local' to achieve a prosperous India, calling on influencers and political parties to promote indigenous products and build a stronger global image through commitment and quality.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/daam-kam-dum-zyada-pm-modis-strong-pitch-amid-tariff-war-big-make-in-india-push-on-independence-day/articleshow/123316264.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/daam-kam-dum-zyada-pm-modis-strong-pitch-amid-tariff-war-big-make-in-india-push-on-independence-day/articleshow/123316264.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:05:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="991460" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317199,imgsize-991460.cms"/></item><item><title>Sholay@50: Why ‘Yeh Dosti’ is Sholay’s most popular song today</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/sholay50-why-yeh-dosti-is-sholays-most-popular-song-today/articleshow/123317481.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/sholay50-why-yeh-dosti-is-sholays-most-popular-song-today/articleshow/123317481.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 10:47:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AVIJIT GHOSH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1984795" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317475,imgsize-1984795.cms"/></item><item><title>'The time has come': Stalin urges legal battle; TN CM calls to reclaim states’ powers</title><description><![CDATA[Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin, in his Independence Day address, urged citizens to reject bigotry and protect the marginalized. He accused the Centre of usurping states' powers in key sectors like education and creating financial dependencies through biased policies. Stalin emphasized the need for political and legal battles to protect states' rights and financial shares, advocating for true federalism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/the-time-has-come-tamil-nadu-cm-mk-stalin-urges-legal-battle-to-reclaim-states-powers/articleshow/123317272.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/the-time-has-come-tamil-nadu-cm-mk-stalin-urges-legal-battle-to-reclaim-states-powers/articleshow/123317272.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 10:29:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="54334" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317285,imgsize-54334.cms"/></item><item><title>Happy Krishna Janmashtami 2025: Best messages, quotes and images to share</title><description><![CDATA[Janmashtami, celebrating Lord Krishna's birth, will be observed on August 15 and 16. Festivities include temple decorations, midnight prayers, and the Dahi Handi tradition. Devotees focus on Krishna's teachings of love, duty, and inner awakening, sharing wishes and images of the celebrations. Homes will be filled with devotion, fasting, and stories of Krishna's life. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-krishna-janmashtami-2025-best-messages-quotes-wishes-images-pictures-greetings-card-gifs-and-images-to-share-on-krishna-janmashtami/articleshow/123242060.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/events/happy-krishna-janmashtami-2025-best-messages-quotes-wishes-images-pictures-greetings-card-gifs-and-images-to-share-on-krishna-janmashtami/articleshow/123242060.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 12:10:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1456506" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123243680,imgsize-1456506.cms"/></item><item><title>1983 World Cup, MS Dhoni's treble and more: India's greatest cricket feats since 1947</title><description><![CDATA[Since 1947, India's cricket journey has been filled with remarkable milestones, including their first Test win in 1952 and series victory against Pakistan. The 1983 World Cup triumph marked a turning point, while MS Dhoni's leadership secured multiple ICC titles. India's dominance in Test cricket at home and recent victories in major tournaments highlight their enduring legacy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/1983-world-cup-ms-dhonis-treble-and-more-indias-greatest-cricket-feats-since-1947/articleshow/123317042.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/1983-world-cup-ms-dhonis-treble-and-more-indias-greatest-cricket-feats-since-1947/articleshow/123317042.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 10:36:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66194" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317344,imgsize-66194.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi promises big Diwali gift! GST reforms to lower tax burden; what he said in I-Day speech</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Modi announced upcoming GST reforms as a Diwali gift, promising a reduced tax burden. A group of state ministers will meet to discuss potential GST reductions for various products, with some opposing changes due to revenue concerns.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/pm-modi-promises-big-diwali-gift-gst-reforms-to-lower-tax-burden-for-common-man-soon-heres-what-he-said-in-independence-day-speech/articleshow/123315960.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/pm-modi-promises-big-diwali-gift-gst-reforms-to-lower-tax-burden-for-common-man-soon-heres-what-he-said-in-independence-day-speech/articleshow/123315960.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 08:57:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="74396" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316118,imgsize-74396.cms"/></item><item><title>India at 79: Google Doodle celebrates India's Independence Day - from cricket to cinema</title><description><![CDATA[Google celebrated India's 79th Independence Day with a doodle showcasing the nation's artistic diversity and achievements. The artwork, created by Boomranng Studio, features regional art forms like Jaipur blue pottery and terracotta relief work. Tiles symbolize India's progress in space, cricket's unifying power, chess dominance, and the global recognition of Indian cinema, highlighting the country's rich cultural heritage.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-at-79-google-doodle-celebrates-indias-independence-day-from-cricket-to-cinema/articleshow/123316987.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-at-79-google-doodle-celebrates-indias-independence-day-from-cricket-to-cinema/articleshow/123316987.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 10:03:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27360" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317027,imgsize-27360.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi unveils Rs 99,446 cr PM-VBRY; here’s how it aims to boost job sector</title><description><![CDATA[On Independence Day 2025, PM Narendra Modi launched the ₹99,446 crore PM-VBRY scheme to create 3.5 crore jobs in two years. Offering incentives to both first-time employees and employers, the programme aims to lower hiring costs, formalise jobs, boost workplace mobility, and spur economic growth across sectors, especially in Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/pm-modi-announces-99446-crore-pm-vbry-scheme-how-it-will-boost-the-job-sector/articleshow/123317263.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/pm-modi-announces-99446-crore-pm-vbry-scheme-how-it-will-boost-the-job-sector/articleshow/123317263.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 10:32:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TRISHA TEWARI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33820" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123317307,imgsize-33820.cms"/></item><item><title>I-Day 2025: Tiranga, Operation Sindoor banner soar above Red Fort - video</title><description><![CDATA[India's 79th Independence Day celebrated the success of Operation Sindoor, targeting terror sites in Pakistan and PoK. PM Modi, addressing the nation from Red Fort, asserted India's firm stance against terrorism, vowing to hold Pakistan accountable for any future aggression. He lauded the armed forces for their unprecedented action during Operation Sindoor, setting a new standard in combating cross-border terrorism and avenging the Pahalgam attack.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/independence-day-2025-tiranga-operation-sindoor-banner-soar-above-red-fort-video/articleshow/123315951.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/independence-day-2025-tiranga-operation-sindoor-banner-soar-above-red-fort-video/articleshow/123315951.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:28:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4345374" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316553,imgsize-4345374.cms"/></item><item><title>AC coach ‘cooling’ issue turns into liquor haul on Bihar bound train</title><description><![CDATA[Passengers traveling on the Lucknow-Barauni Express experienced discomfort due to poor AC cooling, leading to a surprising discovery. Railway technicians found 316 whisky bottles hidden in the AC duct of an AC-2 tier coach. A coach attendant was arrested for smuggling the liquor into Bihar, where prohibition laws have created a lucrative black market, concealing the bottles to avoid detection.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/316-whisky-bottles-found-in-ac-duct-of-dry-bihar-bound-train/articleshow/123312370.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/316-whisky-bottles-found-in-ac-duct-of-dry-bihar-bound-train/articleshow/123312370.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 00:42:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARVIND CHAUHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="67510" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123312370,imgsize-67510.cms"/></item><item><title>'Cricket bahut chhoti cheez hai desh aur jawaano ke aage': Harbhajan Singh on India vs Pakistan in Asia Cup</title><description><![CDATA[Following recent terror attacks and heightened tensions, calls for India to boycott Pakistan in cricket are growing. During the World Championship of Legends, India Champions refused to play Pakistan Champions. Harbhajan Singh advocates for the current team to follow suit in the Asia Cup, emphasizing that national interests outweigh sports, especially considering the sacrifices made by soldiers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/harbhajan-singh-on-india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup-cricket-bahut-chhoti-cheez-hai-desh-aur-jawaano-ke-aage/articleshow/123309905.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/harbhajan-singh-on-india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup-cricket-bahut-chhoti-cheez-hai-desh-aur-jawaano-ke-aage/articleshow/123309905.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 06:15:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="97856" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123309978,imgsize-97856.cms"/></item><item><title>I-Day: US extends warm wishes; calls 'historical ties' with India 'far-reaching'</title><description><![CDATA[The United States congratulated India on its 79th Independence Day, highlighting the significant and extensive historical ties between the two nations. Both countries share a vision for a more peaceful, prosperous, and secure Indo-Pacific region, collaborating across various sectors including technology and space.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/independence-day-us-extends-warm-wishes-calls-historical-ties-with-india-consequential-and-far-reaching/articleshow/123316472.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/independence-day-us-extends-warm-wishes-calls-historical-ties-with-india-consequential-and-far-reaching/articleshow/123316472.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:28:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42586" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316563,imgsize-42586.cms"/></item><item><title>Message to Pak from Red Fort: PM Modi warns ‘India will not tolerate nuclear threats’</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/independence-day-pm-modi-warns-india-will-not-tolerate-nuclear-threats-strong-message-to-pakistan-from-red-fort/articleshow/123315637.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/independence-day-pm-modi-warns-india-will-not-tolerate-nuclear-threats-strong-message-to-pakistan-from-red-fort/articleshow/123315637.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 08:43:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="819358" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315606,imgsize-819358.cms"/></item><item><title>'He won’t be the same player if he…': Ex India cricketer bold verdict on Virat Kohli</title><description><![CDATA[S. Sreesanth defended Virat Kohli's aggressive style, terming it as passion essential for his success. He reflected on the 2008 IPL incident with Harbhajan Singh, revealing its impact on his family and his daughter's perception. Sreesanth emphasized that he wouldn't alter his cricket journey, embracing both challenges and controversies as learning experiences.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/he-wont-be-the-same-player-if-he-former-india-cricketer-bold-verdict-on-virat-kohli/articleshow/123315852.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/he-wont-be-the-same-player-if-he-former-india-cricketer-bold-verdict-on-virat-kohli/articleshow/123315852.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:04:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="119588" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315963,imgsize-119588.cms"/></item><item><title>79th Independence Day: PM Modi continues 'safa' tradition; opts for saffron turban</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to lead the 79th Independence Day celebrations, marking his 12th consecutive address from the Red Fort. Since 2014, PM Modi has showcased India's cultural diversity by wearing distinctive, colourful turbans. Each year, his turban reflects a different region or style, from Rajasthani bandhani to leheriya prints, paired with traditional kurta-churidar and jackets.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-pm-modi-continues-safa-tradition-opts-for-saffron-turban/articleshow/123315212.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/79th-independence-day-pm-modi-continues-safa-tradition-opts-for-saffron-turban/articleshow/123315212.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 07:31:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="716393" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315318,imgsize-716393.cms"/></item><item><title>79th I-Day: PM Modi breaks Indira Gandhi's record; delivers 12th straight speech from Red Fort</title><description><![CDATA[Narendra Modi has surpassed Indira Gandhi's record for consecutive Independence Day addresses from the Red Fort, delivering his 12th speech on Friday. Only Jawaharlal Nehru has delivered more consecutive speeches. Modi broke Manmohan Singh's record last year and in 2023, he delivered the longest Independence Day speech at 98 minutes, combining policy announcements with reflections on India’s progress.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/narendra-modi-breaks-indira-gandhis-record-with-12-consecutive-independence-day-speeches/articleshow/123315947.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/narendra-modi-breaks-indira-gandhis-record-with-12-consecutive-independence-day-speeches/articleshow/123315947.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 08:37:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15898" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315944,imgsize-15898.cms"/></item><item><title>‘First job, Rs15k from govt’: PM announces Viksit Bharat Rozgar Yojana in I-Day speech</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Modi introduced the PM Viksit Bharat Rozgar Yojana on Independence Day, effective from August 1, 2025. This initiative aims to generate 3.5 crore jobs in two years, with a focus on first-time job seekers. The scheme provides incentives for both employees and employers to boost hiring and economic growth, with a substantial budget allocated for its implementation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/first-job-rs-15000-from-govt-pm-modi-announces-pradhan-mantri-viksit-bharat-rozgar-yojana-unveils-scheme-in-independence-day-speech/articleshow/123316214.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/first-job-rs-15000-from-govt-pm-modi-announces-pradhan-mantri-viksit-bharat-rozgar-yojana-unveils-scheme-in-independence-day-speech/articleshow/123316214.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 09:13:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21870" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123316308,imgsize-21870.cms"/></item><item><title>Tea, talk, then tragedy: Bandra woman fatally hit by Mumbai bizman's high-end car</title><description><![CDATA[In Bandra, Kasturbhabai Chavan died after being hit by a car. Jeeva Munecha, the driver, had offered her tea before the accident. Munecha failed to notice Chavan and struck her while starting the car. Police have booked Munecha for negligence and rash driving. Chavan's sons expressed dissatisfaction with the police handling of the case.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/sixty-year-old-woman-fatally-struck-by-businessmans-car-in-mumbai-minutes-after-accepting-tea-from-its-driver-and-chatting-with-him/articleshow/123308311.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/sixty-year-old-woman-fatally-struck-by-businessmans-car-in-mumbai-minutes-after-accepting-tea-from-its-driver-and-chatting-with-him/articleshow/123308311.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 07:35:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>V NARAYAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="121644" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123315296,imgsize-121644.cms"/></item><item><title>'Bengaluru not as planned as Delhi': My children fight with me over traffic, says DKS</title><description><![CDATA[DCM DK Shivakumar admitted to facing daily complaints from his children regarding Bengaluru's severe traffic congestion and deteriorating road infrastructure. He highlighted the exponential increase in vehicles and population, making road widening impractical due to high property costs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/not-just-citizens-my-children-too-fight-with-me-over-traffic-dk-shivakumar/articleshow/123310381.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/not-just-citizens-my-children-too-fight-with-me-over-traffic-dk-shivakumar/articleshow/123310381.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 06:56:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32590" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123314779,imgsize-32590.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Putin won’t mess with me’: Trump before Alaska meet, claims Russia-Ukraine ‘will make peace’</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump asserted that Vladimir Putin won't "mess around" with him ahead of their summit in Alaska, where they plan to discuss a potential ceasefire in Ukraine. Trump believes Putin desires full control of Ukraine but insists this won't happen under his presidency. He also proposed a second meeting involving European leaders and Volodymyr Zelenskyy to foster peace negotiations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/putin-wont-mess-around-with-me-trump-ahead-of-meeting-in-alaska-us-president-says-russia-ukraine-will-make-peace/articleshow/123314236.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/putin-wont-mess-around-with-me-trump-ahead-of-meeting-in-alaska-us-president-says-russia-ukraine-will-make-peace/articleshow/123314236.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 06:13:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22322" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123314447,imgsize-22322.cms"/></item><item><title>SIR row: Supreme Court directs EC to publish 65 lakh deleted names with reasons</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has directed the Election Commission to enhance transparency in Bihar's electoral roll revision by publishing the names and reasons for deletion of 65 lakh voters. This move aims to counter allegations against the special intensive revision (SIR).]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-interdicting-election-commission-power-on-sir-supreme-court/articleshow/123312849.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/not-interdicting-election-commission-power-on-sir-supreme-court/articleshow/123312849.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 02:44:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY.MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="851609" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123312858,imgsize-851609.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[CEF Group is powering India’s green energy future with a €38 million funding boost to launch two flagship compressed biogas plants in Jammu and Ahmedabad.       <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <description><![CDATA[As part of the mandatory open offer, Adani Infrastructure acquired 44,86,193 equity shares (11.32% of PSP Projects’ paid-up capital) from public shareholders. Additionally, it purchased 91,53,779 shares (23.09%) from Patel as per the SPA. Shares of PSP Projects Ltd ended at ₹701.20, up by ₹59.60, or 9.29%, on the BSE.]]></description>
